title: Increased ping.
body:
Hello. Recently I start playing League again, unfortunate my ping increased compare to august 2016. I used to have 58 ms,  then it become 65 ms, and after patch 7.7 it's at 73 ms. I tried a lot of tips/tutorials about decreasing ping even "TROUBLESHOOTING CONNECTION ISSUES" and I'm still at 73 ms.     
 Help, please.

Szymon

replies.body: Your ISP could have changed how you're routing to the game servers, or something else more local.  Since you've gone through the guide, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well and attach the logs they provide to your ticket.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
